t:
Hearing our baby cry, me and my wife started arguing sleepily about whose turn it was to feed the baby.



We realized our mistake when an unknown voice whispered, “Don't worry, I'll take care.”
c:
Then remembering that the baby was with us in our room, we froze as we heard the sound of footsteps nearing.



#wife #husband #argument #baby #crying #intruder #unknown #help
